title: Allocation of Water Resources
content:
Allocation of Water Resources

State Regulations
§ 890.8 - Priorities of water use during drought emergencies
§ 890.9 - Schedule of phased reductions in diversions, releases and flow objectives during drought
§ 890.10 - Drought emergency actions
§ 890.11 - Coordinated operation of lower basin and hydroelectric reservoirs during a basinwide drought
§ 890.12 - Coordinated operation of reservoirs during a lower basin drought warning and drought

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
